landing.greetingMsg: Welcome to Catena-X - The Automotive Network
landing.heading1: Please finish the following application form to complete the registration of your company for Catena-X
landing.point1: The registration form consists of 5 steps and will take approximately 5-10 minutes of your time
landing.point2: You will need the commercial register form of your company. If you want to invite colleagues from your company, you need their email addresses
landing.point3: You can pause the registration at any time. Re-connect to your registration status by using the login data which you received via e-mail.

registration.subHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to actively participate and use all functions in the Catena-X Automotive Network Portal. Most of the tasks can be done in parallel.
registration.regiStep: Register to Catena-X by entering all information requested in the following 5 Steps
registration.regiSubHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to actively participate and use all functions in the Catena-X Automotive Network Portal. Most of the tasks can be done in parallel.

registrationStepOne.verifyCompayDataSubHeading: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
